reviewText: One of Sammo's best, a combination of Kung-Fu & Zombie mayhem in a must see Sammo Hung film.. This Blu-ray has a outstanding image & a DTS-HD 7.1 Soundtrack that is very immersive..  This film must have inspired the style of Kung Fu Hustler it is just a great combination of Action, Comedy & Light Horror, absolutely a Chinese classic film and one I am proud to own in my collection!
Sammo Should Run The Entire Planet
My favorite Sammo Hung Kam-Bo movie. Even better than the magnificent butcher. Just fantastic
